An attempt to discover the will of the deity.

CSThe character may ask one broad question
MSThe character may ask one specific yes/no question.
CFThe deity is annoyed by the intrusion and punishes the invoker with 1d6 Fatigue Levels.

Note: Some clerics prefer to Summon a divine servant of their deity and ask it questions with Divination. A summoned being can be asked three questions.
